title: Part a.
stimulusHtml:
3 points

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum dollar amount the bank can initially lend is $80 and for showing correct work.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum change in demand deposits is $500 and for showing correct work.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum change in the money supply is $400 and for showing correct work.
descriptions:
No points earned.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum dollar amount the bank can initially lend is $80 and for showing correct work.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum change in demand deposits is $500 and for showing correct work.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum change in the money supply is $400 and for showing correct work.

Earns 1 of 3 points.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum dollar amount the bank can initially lend is $80 and for showing correct work.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum change in demand deposits is $500 and for showing correct work.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum change in the money supply is $400 and for showing correct work.

Earns 2 of 3 points.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum dollar amount the bank can initially lend is $80 and for showing correct work.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum change in demand deposits is $500 and for showing correct work.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum change in the money supply is $400 and for showing correct work.

Earns 3 of 3 points.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum dollar amount the bank can initially lend is $80 and for showing correct work.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum change in demand deposits is $500 and for showing correct work.

  • One point is earned for stating that the maximum change in the money supply is $400 and for showing correct work.

title: Part b.
stimulusHtml:
1 point

  • One point is earned for stating that the central bank’s action will increase the money supply by at most $25 million and for showing correct work.
descriptions:
No point earned.

  • One point is earned for stating that the central bank’s action will increase the money supply by at most $25 million and for showing correct work.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

  • One point is earned for stating that the central bank’s action will increase the money supply by at most $25 million and for showing correct work.

title: Part c.
stimulusHtml:
2 points

  • One point is earned for stating that the real wages will fall.

  • One point is earned for explaining that real wages fall because the central bank’s action causes inflation.
descriptions:
No points earned.

  • One point is earned for stating that the real wages will fall.

  • One point is earned for explaining that real wages fall because the central bank’s action causes inflation.

Earns 1 of 2 points.

  • One point is earned for stating that the real wages will fall.

  • One point is earned for explaining that real wages fall because the central bank’s action causes inflation.

Earns 2 of 2 points.

  • One point is earned for stating that the real wages will fall.

  • One point is earned for explaining that real wages fall because the central bank’s action causes inflation.
